Forumns: [url=http://reborn-pkz.webs.com/]Reborn-pkz[/url] (temp) Webclient: [url=http://reborn-pkz.webs.com/webclient]Reborn-pkz - Webclient[/url] Desktop client: [url=http://uppit.com/403kzjkbtjfl/Reborn_Pkz_Client.jar]Download Reborn.Pkz.Client.jar @ UppIT[/url] Our server is a fully working 667 Loading 711 source & client, we have coded a pvp system which works 100%, and we've got a unique play style.
Server We are a Pvp/Eco Server, you start out with some cash to spend in our shops,You get 1.5m a kill, Hosting We're currently hosting on a 2gb VPS, which is more then enough at the moment to hold our players securely,Will upgrade with donations.
Player's Commands ::home ::ticket ::empty ::ranks ::curseson/cursesoff ::ancients ::barragerunes ::lunars ::vengrunes ::moderns ::kdr ::changepass ::vengrunes
v=for all kinds of pvp set spawns=v ::melee ::mage ::range ::hybrid ::rangetank ::puremage ::purerange - probably more to come.
Custom Features -Killstreaks -Killstreak Rewards -Safe Pvp (White portal) -News -Random Pvp Drops -Dicing Has Returned! -KillStreak Ranks Table Added -Clan wars-Only white portal works atm -Fastest switches,Great pking,Great bridding
Thanks for reading.

@berdinx wrote:

Forumns: Reborn-pkz (temp)
Webclient: Reborn-pkz - Webclient
Desktop client: Download Reborn.Pkz.Client.jar @ UppIT
Our server is a fully working 667 Loading 711 source & client, we have coded a pvp system which works 100%, and we’ve got a unique play style.

Server
We are a Pvp/Eco Server, you start out with some cash to spend in our shops,You get 1.5m a kill,
Hosting
We’re currently hosting on a 2gb VPS, which is more then enough at the moment to hold our players securely,Will upgrade with donations.
